channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 06:06 Air alarm to Kamyansky District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 06:06 Air alarm to Kamyansky District Surveat for Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 05:57 The threat of shelling! Now in the Belenkovsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 游댮 05:57 The threat of shelling! Now in the Belenkovsky territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 04:47 Flashing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kryvyi Rih rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 04:47 Flashing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kryvyi Rih rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
